info.title: Roomi Services
info.description: Comprehensive API for Roomi AI services including events, complaints, payments, facilities, routines, and email services
info.x-aws-sigv4-info: AWS SigV4 Authentication: Requests must include Authorization header with AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 signature, X-Amz-Content-Sha256 header with request body hash, and X-Amz-Date header with ISO8601 timestamp. Region: me-central-1, Service: execute-api. Additionally, all requests require x-unit-id and x-user-id headers.
